name: enforceable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a law or rule) possible to make people obey, or possible to make happen or be accepted: The guidelines are legally enforceable. We need enforceable environmental and safety laws. See
enforce
More examplesFewer examplesThere are clear, enforceable rules regarding intellectual property and copyright protection.There has to be economic reform that makes our laws enforceable.Childcare workers are held to consistent and enforceable standards.

Add to word list
Add to word list
an enforceable law, rule, contract, etc. is one that people can be made to obey: The contract may not be legally enforceable if it is not drawn up correctly.
